cause.description:
We try to wake up those whose minds are closed. We are for education, understanding, tolerance, and acceptance.
We have absolutely no religious affiliation. Love is our religion. We are for all decisions, whether it be pro-choice or pro-life, chastity or promiscuity.
We support any and all decisions, as long as the decision is based on a fully educated and comprehensive understanding of what you are supporting.
1. Equal Rights
2. Education
3. Unconditional Love
cause.mission: Spread love amongst all mindkind and create equality through understanding and tolerance.
cause.name: Free Love
